definition: to melt/to thaw/to blend/to merge/to be in harmony

sentences.english: The subducted slabs was metamorphosed to water-bearing eclogite before being melted.
sentences.chinese: 該俯衝板片熔融前通常變質爲含水的榴輝巖。

sentences.english: A molten metal moves from a crucible into a vacuum chamber through a tube.
sentences.chinese: 熔融金屬通過一根管子從熔爐進入真空室。

sentences.english: Abundant fluid melt inclusions are found in the crystals of ruby and sapphire.
sentences.chinese: 脈體中的紅藍寶石晶體中發現大量流體熔融包裹體。

sentences.english: To shape molten metal by pouring into a mold to produce an ingot or a continuously cast slab.
sentences.chinese: 將熔融的金屬倒進模子裏成型，以製成錠鐵或扁鋼錠。

sentences.english: The Carboniferous volcanic rocks originated from partial melting of the crust.
sentences.chinese: 石炭紀火山岩爲部分熔融作用的產物。

sentences.english: The enrichment and recovery of tantalum and niobium through acid leaching and sodium alkali fusing from tungsten residue is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用酸浸與鈉鹼熔融法從鎢渣中富集和回收鉭鈮。

sentences.english: The fibre diameter increases with increasing fluidity of the molten oxide .
sentences.chinese: 熔融氧化物的流化度增大，纖維直徑增大。

sentences.english: The same gas performs frothing of the molten metal before the latter is driven into the vacuum chamber.
sentences.chinese: 同時，該氣體會讓熔融金屬在進入真空室之前起泡。

sentences.english: Those polyamides used commercially are sufficiently stable to be spun from a melt.
sentences.chinese: 這些商業用的聚酰胺在熔融紡絲過程中十分穩定。

sentences.english: Reliable estimation of melt index(MI) is crucial for the production of polypropylene.
sentences.chinese: 可靠地預報熔融指數在聚丙烯生產過程中至關重要。

sentences.english: The metal-sulfide phase of previous melting experimental results of Zhaodong chondrite was observed and analysed again.
sentences.chinese: 並與先前肇東隕石全巖樣的高壓熔融實驗進行比較。

sentences.english: And the higher the melting temperature of polypropylene sample, the higher melt draft ratio is required for piling up.
sentences.chinese: 熔融溫度越高，排狀堆積片晶所需的熔體拉伸比越高。

sentences.english: At temperatures high enough to melt it, titanium exposed to air catches fire.
sentences.chinese: 在溫度足夠高時，與空氣接觸的熔融鈦會着火。

sentences.english: The main factors that affect the leaching rate of potassium in potash feldspar were studied.
sentences.chinese: 對熔融氯化鈉浸取鉀長石的提鉀過程進行了研究。

sentences.english: Technology survey and development tendency investigation on tantalum-niobium hydrometallurgical extraction;
sentences.chinese: 研究了用酸浸與鈉鹼熔融法從鎢渣中富集和回收鉭鈮。

sentences.english: A great mumber of melt inclusions are there in the quartz phenocrysts.
sentences.chinese: 石英晶屑內熔融包裹體發育。

definition: to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
